entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
